chart_description: This chart shows the amount of time Cassandra spends on garbage collection in seconds.

dimension_descriptions.cms: The CMS (Concurrent Mark and Sweep) Garbage Collector is used to collect the old generation heap space in Cassandra. This dimension shows the amount of time spent on CMS GC.
dimension_descriptions.parnew: The ParNew Garbage Collector is used to collect the young generation heap space in Cassandra. This dimension shows the amount of time spent on ParNew GC.
